title: Has anyone figured out how to fix the Mac problem?
body:
I've reinstalled, used Hextech Repair Tool, reinstalled again. Forced patch. Restarted computer. Reset my DNS. Disabled my firewall. Forced a clean boot of my computer.


And no, this is not a problem with my connection to the servers.

Whenever I click Launch, the launcher closes as if it's done what it's supposed to do, and I'm stuck staring at my reflection at the blank screen contemplating my life decisions.

replies.body: These issue that you're reporting here usually results from a network block preventing you from connecting to the patching server.  I understand you feel it's not your connection and I'm totally up to hear out why, but I still recommend going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out a few more possibilities.  I hope that helps!

I noticed when the HRT tries to reinstall the game, it isn't installing all the necessary files that the client needs to operate correctly. I think possibly Riot may need to take a look at an issue regarding the Mac LoL download link or something. It's obviously not downloading the correct files as the icons are Legacy and the full download seems to be like 7mb which is definitely not possible...
I've already gone through the connection issues guide multiple times, nothing is working

Is there something about the newest version of the client that makes it connect differently? Nothing about my connection has changed recently (and i'm having the same problem over multiple different connections, all which used to work perfectly), i've been using the updated client since it's beta, and never had an issue until it's newest update. I've clean reinstalled, run the hextech repair tool, still the same issue. I just want to get back in game.

Yeah!  The legacy client and updated version are separate applications.  Your settings may have been configured on the legacy, but may need some tuning up on the updated client.  The steps in that guide should help.  :D

again, I've been using the updated client for months, haven't used the legacy client since the updated client beta came out, and i've never had an issue. and i've followed all the advice in that guide and no dice. still won't open.

What i was asking is if there is a connection difference between the updated client that came with 7.9 and the updated client that comes with 7.10.

Nope, our services that your network needs to connect to have changed between patches.  For your specific case from reading your previous posts, I suggest hitting us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for our tech team to assist you individually.  Grab the logs obtained through the HRT and attach it to the ticket for some more context.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
I've submitted two tickets and both were marked as solved, and I'm still at square one
That's weird, can I have your ticket number to take a look?

Your response was received!  Solved usually just means a response was sent, not to worry.  You can continue speaking with your specialist until the ticket is set to Closed.  He'll get back to you as soon as he's reviewed your logs and able to!
